Talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad_00>Ugh...<sp:5:0:0> Without that boat, I guess I'm
just stuck.
Talk0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Notice_00>Oh...it doesn't look like you can carry
anything else.

I thought I'd give you a <clr:0000>star fragment<clr:ffff>
as thanks, but...

<sp:3:0:2:0701>It's OK! I'll hold on to it until you've
made room for it among your things.

I don't want to leave you empty-handed
after you helped me reopen the general
store, after all.
Talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Tired_01>The thing is <clr:0000>my boat's gone<clr:ffff>, and with it,
how I get <clr:0000>my trading<clr:ffff> done. I don't know
where it's gotten to...
All of the boats in the village are gone
too, so I can't even find a <clr:0000>replacement
for it<clr:ffff>.
I'm sure that because of the mayhem the
monsters caused, they all got washed out
to <clr:0000>sea<clr:ffff>...
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>Things that float away from our village
often wash up on <clr:0000>Tenoko<clr:ffff>, an island off
the eastern coast. Maybe they're there.
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0a01><clr:ffff>Of course, <clr:0000>Tenoko Island<clr:ffff> is way out
to sea, and I don't have a boat...<sp:5:0:0>to get
a boat.
Seems like I'm stuck, then. I'll never be
able to <clr:0000>reopen my shop<clr:ffff>.

I sell some <clr:0000>things you can find only here<clr:ffff>,
and my customers are eager to see me
get my shop up and running again...
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>I just need to get my hands on a <clr:0000>boat<clr:ffff>,
that's all.
Talk0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>You're in good spirits whenever
I see you...
Talk0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I thought I'd give you a <clr:0000>star fragment<clr:ffff>
as thanks for bringing me a boat, but...

<sp:3:0:2:0701>It's OK! I'll hold on to it until you've
made room for it among your things.

I don't want to leave you empty-handed
after you helped me reopen the general
store, after all.
Talk0026:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Do you have room for a reward? Then I
can finally thank you properly!
Talk0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I don't know how I'll get by without my
<clr:0000>boat<clr:ffff>. If only I had another one, but every
one in the village got washed out to <clr:0000>sea<clr:ffff>.
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01>And probably washed up on <clr:0000>Tenoko Island<clr:ffff>, out in
the <clr:0000>eastern <clr:ffff>waters... <sp:5:0:0>But no boat means no way to
get there. Ugh.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Tired_01><sp:0:2:2:6400>Seems like I'm just stuck. I'll never be
able to <clr:0000>reopen my shop<clr:ffff>.

I sell some <clr:0000>things you can find only here<clr:ffff>,
and my customers are eager to see me
get my shop up and running again...
Talk0027: Heyyy! Over here! And bring that boat!
Talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><clr:0000>My boat's gone<clr:ffff>, and with it, how I'll get
<clr:0000>any trading done<clr:ffff>. I don't know where it's
gotten to...
All the boats in the village are gone too,
so I can't even find a <clr:0000>replacement for it<clr:ffff>.

I'm sure that because of the mayhem the
monsters caused, they all got washed out
to <clr:0000>sea<clr:ffff>...
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>Things that float away from our village
often wash up on <clr:0000>Tenoko Island<clr:ffff>, in the<clr:0000><clr:ffff>
eastern waters.<clr:0000> <clr:ffff>Maybe they're there.
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0a01><clr:ffff>Of course, <clr:0000>Tenoko Island<clr:ffff> is a little island
out there, and I don't have a boat...<sp:5:0:0>to get
a boat.
Seems like I'm stuck, then. I'll never be
able to <clr:0000>reopen my shop<clr:ffff>.

I sell some <clr:0000>things you can find only here<clr:ffff>,
and my customers are eager to see me
get my shop up and running again...
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>I just need to get my hands on a <clr:0000>boat<clr:ffff>,
that's all.
Talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>You found a boat for me! Thank you
so much!<sp:5:1:0>

Such generosity demands swift action.


So, <sp:5:0:0>if you'll just excuse me for a bit...
Talk0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>Hmm... So, I need this part...<sp:5:2:0> And that
goes there... <sp:5:1:0>I think?

Ah, get that out of way, and yeah?<sp:5:1:0>
No? Maybe?<sp:5:1:0> Yes! <sp:5:0:0>It's done!
Talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS_01>Oh, <sp:5:0:0>you're Link! Well, here you are,
our hero!

<sp:3:0:2:0801>I returned to my village when I heard that
the pirates disappeared. Who'd think I'd
bump into you here?<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0b01>Well, unfortunately, I don't really have
time to chat.
Talk0020: <sp:3:0:2:0a01>You're in good spirits at this late hour.
Talk0008:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Ta-da!<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>What do you think?<sp:5:0:0> I'm going to call this
fine vessel the Ever-Lovely Mubs!<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:2:2:6400>

Something about giving it a name really
makes it more important to me.

Here, take this. It's the least I can do
after you helped me reopen my store!
Talk0021: <sp:3:0:2:0a01>You're in good spirits even soaking wet!
Talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>This is a very rare thing you can't
buy anywhere!

I don't sell star fragments either, but
my shop does try to stock rarer things
you can't find elsewhere if I can.
I take pride in my goods, so please come
back to shop whenever you like!
Talk0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Painful_00>Sorry, is that...<sp:0:4:0>Has there always been a boat there?<sp:5:0:0>
Unbelievable!
